directions: Mix edamame, chickpeas, red onion, red bell pepper, carrot, sunflower seeds, dried cranberries, olive oil, honey, vinegar, mayonnaise, celery salt, and cayenne pepper together in a large bowl.
ingredients: 1/4 cup sweetened dried cranberries (such as Ocean Spray® Craisins®)
1/4 teaspoon celery salt, or more to taste
1/8 teaspoon cayenne pepper, or more to taste
title: Chickpea and Edamame Salad
